website_summaries.verdict: Keyboard performs well for the price and offers multiple macro keys.
pros: Uses shift-plus technology so you can easily program 3 dozen macro keys
Additional macro keys near the space bar for use with thumb
Has a comfortable wrist rest for long gaming sessions
cons: Some keys seem to stick after using the keyboard for a while

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard, quiet keys & well lit.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is meant for gaming but I bought this for my wife to use as a telecommuting customer service rep as she wore out the keys on her previous MS split keyboard. It took some getting used to compared to the giant sized split keyboard but at least she can see the letters on the keys and the keystrokes are pretty quiet too. If there is a gripe it would be that you can only change the color on all of the keys. It would be helpful to be able to have say the number keys 1 color & the letters a different color but then again I didn't spend $150 for this keyboard either.
customer_reviews.author: StillaYankee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is pretty good. It's comfortable to use, the macro keys are nice, and the customization options are nice as well. You can change the color of the keyboard to any color in the spectrum. I like having my keyboard backlit white, but it looks somewhat yellow.. But that's beside the point. The main drawback for this keyboard is the fact that the multimedia keys do not light up. In the dark you will fumble to find the correct key for volume up/down, play/pause, etc. but that's a minor issue. For a non-mechanical gaming keyboard, it is very very good. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Pip123

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is amazing. The keys are responsive and the driver is great as well as very user-friendly. The keyboard itself is fairly quiet, having soft strokes instead of harsh mechanical ones, which I quite enjoy since I'm not a big fan of the mechanical sound. I've had it a while and it seems to be really durable so that is a plus. Everything is also really sleek and aesthetically pleasing. Besides the 5 base colors though, there's not really a differentiation between shades of colors, but that doesn't really matter much to me. Overall, definitely a recommended buy from me.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade !!
customer_reviews.text: great keyboard . the large, solid palm support along the bottom is great . my last keyboard was hinged and I couldn't count how many times it came unhinged . the lights are awesome with its own auto dim settings independent of the pc .I have not used the macros yet but I can tell you the 3 under the space bar will be the first 3 I use if and when I fill up the ones on my naga mouse .
customer_reviews.author: Kingfish

customer_reviews.title: Slight let down...but it works....
customer_reviews.text: The software doesn't like to stick. By that I mean that the color programming doesn't always stay where I put it. Also, the Caps button doesn't work. Random, yet annoying. Decided to give three stars due to these problems but not less because they don't affect my use too much. Just slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and elegant
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift from my husband to me. we are gamers and enjoy gaming but only with helpful tools which we need to play what we play. I needed the colored background of the keys as I from time to time need to see which key I am pressing. I love the 1000s of colors to choose from and the fact I can have it change colors without having to do it myself. I loved it so much my hubby wanted one and so the next day he got one too. :) I hope this review help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He has had it for several months and its still working fantastic. Just to explain HOW well its working
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my stepson and he is crazy about this keyboard. He has had it for several months and its still working fantastic. Just to explain HOW well its working, Roccat devices come with software that tracks your usage and has some rewards for certain mile markers you hit, and at this point hes hitting 3 million keystrokes. Yeah, its working just fine. The pics in the listing is what we got.
customer_reviews.author: davdjmor

customer_reviews.title: Costly but Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful keyboard, I was able to get it to match my orange and black PC build perfectly. I highly recommend this keyboard, especially if you're a gamer and you want an LED keyboard to match your build's color scheme. Anti-ghosting so you don't have to worry about how many keys you hit at one time, and profile management so you can change what macros/keys do on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how big it is either
customer_reviews.text: they keys are noisy, there is no caps lock button which I use for VOIP and the key to replace is not usable. I don't like how big it is either.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: The keys have already started to fail and I just purchased such a short time ago
customer_reviews.text: Already some of the keys are not working which is making it incredibly irritating 2 try and type anyting
customer_reviews.author: Timothy TJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is a great keyboard. The macros are amazing. I put my email as one of the macros and it would type out my email. The colors are amazing. I just wish you could have more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: I have owned two of these keyboards, both have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these keyboards, both have failed. The new one I just ordered came with the backspace not working. Going to try and return. Avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Best Keyboard I've ever come across.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research all over the internet before spending the big bucks and it was well worth my time and money. The key mapping changes automatically for each game profile once you set it up and it goes back to your designated default when you're done playing. For example, I turn on my computer and it starts with the Windows key mapping profile (I have the color blue for that). Then I launch Fallout 3 and the keyboard changes to green and the mapping automatically changes to my set up in the game! It's insane! It also work great with the ROCCAT Kone XTD, which offers the very similar functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Lest

customer_reviews.title: Great but No capslock
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is tactile even though its not a mech. Its good for esport game and partner i with roccat mouse to activate roccat talk its cool when you get poisonedthe mouse and keyboard reacts with green light its depend on your customization
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Allem

customer_reviews.title: Shiny colors
customer_reviews.text: The roccat talk is a gimmick, I've yet to see it implemented anywhere, the colors are neat, the key feel is actually great for a non mechanical key switch, it's a little tall in that I cant reach the function keys without pulling the wrist rest off the keyboard tray I'm using
customer_reviews.author: Nick Aytch

customer_reviews.title: Great for gamers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, and he loves it! The only thing he wishes it had was a removable wrist rest, but he still loves it as is.
customer_reviews.author: ScienceMomma

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is horrible. One of the keys stopped working in a ...
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is horrible. One of the keys stopped working in a few days. Don't waste your money on this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Yardbird

customer_reviews.title: dont buy from DELL
customer_reviews.text: You could spend $100 at DELL or get it cheaper here if your smart you will do what i did. Brand new in box all key's work and LEDs all work. Surprisingly Amazon got it right.
customer_reviews.author: Hentie

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard! A little on the expensive side but it was completely worth it ! Color is beautiful, lighting bright, player profiles are easy to monitor and change, and it is very responsive! Only problem is the keys are a little too close to each other so if you have bigger hands (like me)it will take some getting use to. Also if you are anal about finger marks you may want a cloth to rub them away because finger prints will get on the edging of the key. I love this keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Calvano

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Its so smooth and easy to use. Sadly when i purchased it i had to wait 3weeks to get a shipping schedule because it was out of stock. But this is better than a razer keyboard
customer_reviews.author: P3stechi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my son's gaming computer. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: mkinney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice keyboard i love that the keys light up.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old gamer is very happy with this keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: A. McGann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got mine different of the picture but still great keyboard, very confortable and strong.
customer_reviews.author: MaramiR

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good keyboard, and it's very comfortable to use, however the keycaps are easily scratched, so over time they'll wear away the letters and other keys. But if you feel like that you can still use it without being able to see anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alkaris

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard but it should be mechanical for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard but it should be mechanical for the price. The biggest pet peve that bothers me is THE BLUE LED LIGHTS! You can not change the color of these blue LED's and I am going for a black and red setup so its quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for nearly a year now and it's still doing great! I love this keyboard! It's comfortable on the hands and it works! Haven't had an issue with it as of yet. It works great with other Roccat devices and it's very easy to set up with Roccat program. Love it! 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Simon

customer_reviews.title: Night mood lighting from a keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and I love the back lighting for night time computing.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Tampa FL

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is an excellent performer, software is super annoying.  Why do I have to unsubscribe from keylogging?
customer_reviews.text: I like this keyboard, would buy again. The software is annoying. Why would I want my keyboard to log how many times I use WASD keys etc and then SCREAM at me when I hit some number like it's a nice achievement? Seriously, the volume on these announcement is so loud. Also, you aren't going to hit the first "achievement" for several thousands keystrokes so you will forget that this is coming. Go into the software and disable them, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: supyo55

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get keyboard but so far not going well. PRO's 1-Good looking keyboard 2-Awesome wrist rest 3-Incredibly customizable keyboard. 4-Great software 5-Fantastic keyfeel for a membrane keyboard However there are some SERIOUS cons at the moment. I will change my rating if i can resolve them. 1-The feet used to raise the keyboard are INCREDIBLY WEAK and unstable. 2-The keyboard is a bit expensive for being membrane considering its rgb mechanical competition is only 60-70.00 more 3-The compatability with Alienware Fx software is nonexistant. Drivers were updated on both sides,keyboard and alienware
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for games and school
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard for games and school. Tons of macros I don't even know what to do with. Good software thats kind of complicated at first. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E Sears

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Was a great keyboard for the 5 years I owned one. Highly recommended as far a durability and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce E. Hauch

customer_reviews.title: ... could have different colors for different keys still really awesome though.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish i could have different colors for different keys still really awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Stellrecht

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard, I always recommend it and ever bought another for my second computer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The Roccat ISKU FX Multicolor illuminated keyboard is a fine keyboard and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: The Roccat ISKU FX Multicolor illuminated keyboard is a fine keyboard and reasonably priced. I would recommend this keyboard to those who don't want a mechanical keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.. warning the keyboard will work ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY.. warning the keyboard will work properly when u get it but it has software defects..... Roccat published that the keyboard has software defects.. some times the keys don't work and the only way to fix it is to restart the computer .... DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kerbel

customer_reviews.title: Known issue sticky key after months use
customer_reviews.text: keyboard suddenly became unusable because of sticky key issue or ARM chip issue, whenever i press a key there will be 2 or 3 more keys being pressing by the keyboard itself, happened after three months of use, so there would be no return or replacement, no any wire or water dmg to the keyboard, it just break like that, would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: great for games and fast typing
customer_reviews.text: honestly, i was a little worried about this product because of the price and the quality they were trying to sell you, and i was wrong. Product is over the top keyboard, great for games and fast typing!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Reis

customer_reviews.text: Awesome keyboard. I was originally nervous ordering this as mechanical keyboards are so widely praised. But I purchased this one instead of the mechanical version solely for the backlit keys customization. Zero regrets. Feels awesome, looks awesome. Don't think twice!
customer_reviews.author: Tarnish-Me-Not

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: it was the last piece to my computer and I took a chance on a refurbished product, but I won't be doing that again because it seems they just repackaged a broken item because i turn the computer off, installed the keyboard and upon turning the computer back on and typing my password in that I couldn't get into my own computer because the keys: , s i = were all coded to type the wrong symbol, multiple symbols and/or open a random computer program like files or photo gallery. I built my computer and even for me and my friend mapping the keys on any keyboard like this is way too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond P

customer_reviews.title: I can't find enough words to say how amazing this keyboard is
customer_reviews.text: I can't find enough words to say how amazing this keyboard is. I had to purchase a new one, because of the carbage that my Razer's Lycosa was. And the Roccat is perfect in almost every way.
customer_reviews.author: Ademar Mendonça Neto

customer_reviews.title: Just 2 suggestions for a perfect keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I just wish that it bring Ñ key and It can be a little smaller, but overall is pretty good :)
customer_reviews.author: Kiulg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best keyboards out there, I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed AlDughaither

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gaming keyboards
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard. Love the feel, response, and looks. It's one of the best keyboards I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Sans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has a lot of function and durability. If you're not looking to go mechanical, this is definitely a good purchase. It is comfortable, looks great, and the Roccat Talk software is really helpful in setting up profiles. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wade O.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my worn gaming keyboard for this. Its very comfortable and the features are really cool especially with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Keven Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really nice keyboard but unfun when cap lock raging. Because there is no caps lock button. Still a very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with Roccat. And I was very happily surprised. Best mechanical keyboard I have had bar none.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Francis

product_meta.title: ROCCAT ISKU FX Multicolor Key Illuminated Gaming Keyboard, Black
product_meta.description:
ROCCAT talk combine devices - For unstoppable power ROCCAT talk lets your compatible ROCCAT gaming devices join forces - for amazing set bonus advantages that let you play faster, Win more and enjoy a more intense game. The ROCCAT Isku FX multicolor gaming Keyboard, The Kone XTD and the Kone pure are the world's first devices to be connected with the ROCCAT talk protocol - and they work great together. For example, ROCCAT talk lets you take advantage of our exclusive easy-shift[+] technology like never before. Now you can use the easy-shift[+] key on your Isku FX to activate macros for both the keyboard and mouse a one-stop short-cut that makes giving orders quicker and easier. Easy-aim technology to perfection when playing with the Isku FX and the Kone XTD or Kone pure. When you need precise marksmanship in Sniper mode, Just press and hold a single Isku FX key and easy-aim will instantly optimize the dpi setting on your Kone XTD or Kone pure. This unprecedented two-handed team marksmanship is the most convenient way ever to be the deadliest Sniper in the game. The powerful ROCCAT talk protocol can also FORGE unprecedented software and hardware alliances thanks to a bold new feature called ROCCAT talk FX, which translates on-screen game action into exciting sensory effects on your gaming hardware for a new level of intensity-packed play. Event lighting feature, the lighting system on your device will activate in a certain color every time A corresponding in-game event occurs. Imagine getting hit with a fireball in your favorite RPG and having your Isku FX explode in glowing red bursts that dramatically mirror the on-screen attack! Or imagine getting Shot with a poison-tipped arrow and having your mouse Pulse in bursts of toxic green light that echo the nasty poison pumping through your Veins!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The Isku features ROCCAT's Easy-Shift[+] technology, which offers 36 customizable macros strategically positioned in three spots in the easy-to-find WASD zone. This means you can fire off orders without ever having to re-adjust your hand position.

Easy-Shift[+] technology Because the Easy-Shift[+] key works just like the standard shift key, activating your macros is as simple as typing an uppercase letter.

The Easy-Shift[+] zone gives you 28 macros keys, including eight dedicated keys that can be doubly programmed. Plus, the ability to instantly switch between five profiles lets you enjoy up to 180 macros.

PROGRAMMABLE THUMB MACRO KEYS
ROCCAT put three individually-programmable Thumbster macro keys right below the Isku's spacebar, each easily activated with a quick thumb strike. Perfect for casting a lightning-quick healing spell in the middle of a tough fight. Brilliant for a rapid weapon change. Think of your thumbs as two new eager allies.

RECORD MACROS MID-ACTION OR WHENEVER
New enhanced Macro Live! technology makes in-game macro recording easy. Simply hit the dedicated Macro Live! Recording button and let the handy new sound feedback tool talk you through the quick and easy recording process, step by step. You can program up to 500 actions for each of the 180 macros, giving you the freedom to lay down any orders you can dream up. And you won't have to leave your game to do it.

If recording macros using a menu-based system is more your style, ROCCAT's Macro Manager software is just what you want. The Macro Manager lets you record and fine-tune your macros with incredible precision and with intuitive ease thanks to a simple-to-use interface. The new Loop Function even lets you repeat your settings up to 255 times. The program also comes with presets for top games and office apps so you can enjoy your favorites with no wait.

Easy-to-read keys SAVE PROFILES
Save your favorite settings--button configurations, lighting level, DPI preference, and more--in five handy profile slots and activate each instantaneously with the simple press of a button so you can game your way with speed and ease. You'll always know which profile you've chosen thanks to 5 bright LED profile indicators. And with the clever Sound Feedback tool, the world-famous ROCCAT Voice will even tell you which profile you've selected. You can even set a profile for Windows which the Isku will automatically switch back to when you've finished gaming.

OPTIMIZED LIGHTING
Thanks to its off-white UV-coated keys and ice blue backlighting in six adjustable brightness levels, the Isku makes it easy to always hit the right key, even in low lighting. The Isku's optimized illumination also means it's perfect for avoiding eye strain during those long gaming sessions. Plus, you can program the Isku to automatically switch its lights off if you haven't hit a key for a length of time of your choosing, great for when you want to take a break from your game.

COMFORT WRIST REST
The Isku's Integrated extra-large granular wrist rest acts like a sofa for your hands, providing perfect stability and comfort so you can avoid wrist fatigue even when gaming into the wee hours. Its advanced granular surface also enables fast, yet controlled, lateral movement for optimized play even during the most hectic battles.

ISKU STAYS PUT
Flip the Isku over and you'll find five rubberized non-slip gaming boots and two rubberized lock-fast gaming feet. This means the Isku stays put, even during the most intense play session. The retractable gaming feet also position the Isku at the ideal gaming angle of 5.90 degrees, ensuring the quickest key activation and best typing comfort possible.

OPTIMIZED KEY HEIGHT
The Isku boasts medium height keys with fully-optimized key architecture, giving you a perfect striking surface and ideal keystroke response for finger action that feels right every time. The 1000Hz polling rate also ensures fast keyboard response with no lag, so your commands are carried out instantaneously. And advanced anti-ghosting technology means multiple keys can be depressed simultaneously, making sure you can take full advantage of every complex command at your disposal.

KEEP CABLES HIDDEN
Your headset and mouse cables can now easily be tidied away using the handy cable channels under the Isku.

COUNTDOWN TIMER
The Isku comes standard with the ROCCAT timer, which gives you an audible countdown timer for any event you wish. Among other uses, you'll always know exactly how long it'll be before something re-spawns on the battlefield.

CONFIGURABLE MEDIA KEYS
The Isku features a row of eight fully-configurable media keys, optimally positioned at the top of the keyboard for quick and easy access to 25 handy functions of your choice. It also features 12 programmable F keys, giving you a full range of customization options.
feature_bullets: The Isku FX is the only keyboard in the world to feature our groundbreaking Easy-Shift[+] technology, which offers you the wonder of 36 easily-customizable macros strategically positioned in 3 spots in the easy-to-find WASD zone.

Three individually-programmable thumbster macro keys right below the Isku fx’s space bar - Each easily activated with a quick thumb strike. Perfect for casting a lightning-quick healing spell in the middle of a tough FIGHT.
Multicolor key illumination with 16.8 million colors of your choice; with 6 brightness levels, 3 Easy-Shift[+] zones for easy key duplication
36 easy-to-reach macro keys including 3 thumbster keys, macro live! Recording with dedicated m-rec button; 180+ macros in 5 profiles
8 Configurable media and hotkeys 25+ assignable functions, medium-height keys with an optimum keystroke & pressure point; advanced anti-ghosting; 1000Hz polling rate

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars88 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
